#	Improve semantics using schema (https://schema.org/docs/gs.html)

##	Itemscope and itemtype

Wrap content block in `itemscope` to define area.  Use `itemtype=""` along with URL to relevant schema content type (e.g. https://schema.org/Product)


## Itemprop

Additional information about content type, matching available props within specific schema.




#	Place (https://schema.org/Place)

##	Address example

```
<article 
	class="site-address"
	itemscope 
	itemprop="address" 
	itemtype="http://schema.org/PostalAddress"
>
	<h4>Address</h4> 

	<span>Folds Road</span> 
	<span itemprop="addressLocality">Bolton</span> 
	<span itemprop="addressRegion"Lancashire</span> 
	<span itemprop="postalCode">BL1 2ST</span>

	<span itemprop="telephone">01204 786514</span>
 	<a 
 		href="mailto:test@customer.com" 
 		itemprop="email"
 	>
 		contact@company.com
 	</a>
</article>
```




#	Vehicle (https://schema.org/Car)
##	(https://schema.org/docs/automotive.html)


Example:

```

<section 
    itemscope 
    itemprop="itemOffered" 
    itemtype="http://schema.org/Car"
>
    <h1 itemprop="name">2009 Volkswagen Golf V GTI MY09 Direct-Shift Gearbox</h1>
    
    <p itemprop="description">
        2009 Volkswagen Golf V GTI MY09 Direct-Shift Gearbox in perfect 
        mechanical condition and low kilometres. It's impressive 2.0 litre turbo engine makes 
        every drive a fun experience. Well looked after by one owner with full service history. 
        It drives like new and has only done 50,000kms. (...)
    </p>
    
    <img 
        href="2009_Volkswagen_Golf_V_GTI_MY09.png" 
        alt="some alt"
        itemprop="image" 
    >
    <p>Color: 
        <span itemprop="color">Milano Red</span>
    </p>
    <p>Interior Color: 
        <span itemprop="colorInterior">Black</span>
    </p>
    <p>Interior Type: 
        <span itemprop="interiorType">Leather upholstery</span>
    </p>
    <p>Model Year: 
        <time itemprop="modelDate">2009</time>
    </p>    
    <p>Transmission: 
        <span itemprop="transmission">6 speed Sports Automatic Dual Clutch</span>
    </p>  
    <p>VIN: 
        <span itemprop="VIN">WVWZZZ1KZ9U######</span>
    </p>  
    <p>Number of gears: 
        <span itemprop="gears">6</span>
    </p>    
    <p>Body: 
        <span itemprop="bodyType">Hatchback</span>
    </p>
    <p>Number of doors: 
        <span itemprop="doors">3</span>
    </p>
    <p>Number of seats: 
        <span itemprop="seatingCapacity">5</span>
    </p>
    <p>Drive Type: 
        <link 
            itemprop="driveWheelConfiguration" 
            href="http://schema.org/FWD"
        >
        Front Wheel Drive
    </p>
    <p>Engine: 
        <span itemprop="engineName">4 cylinder Petrol Turbo Intercooled 2.0 L (1984 cc)</span></p>
    <p>Engine Power: 
        <span 
            itemprop="enginePower" 
            itemscope 
            itemtype="http://schema.org/QuantitativeValue"
        >
            <span itemprop="value">147</span> 
                <meta 
                    itemprop="unitCode" 
                    content="BHP"
                >
                BHP
            </span>
        </span>
    </p>
    <p>Fuel type: <span itemprop="fuelType">Petrol</span></p>
    <p>Engine Size: 
        <span 
            itemscope 
            itemprop="engineDisplacement" 
            itemtype="http://schema.org/QuantitativeValue"
        >
            <span itemprop="value">1984</span> 
            <meta 
                itemprop="unitCode" 
                content="CMQ"
            >
            ccm
        </span>
    </p>
    <p>Mileage: 
        <span 
            itemscope 
            itemprop="mileageFromOdometer" 
            itemtype="http://schema.org/QuantitativeValue"
        >
            <span itemprop="value">53100</span> 
            <meta 
                itemprop="unitCode" 
                content="KMT"
            >
            km
        </span>
    </p>
    <p>CO2 Emission Combined: 
        <span itemprop="emissionCO2">192</span> g/km
    </p>
</section>
```
